member.name: M:name_sorter.Program.writeFile``1(System.Collections.Generic.List{``0},System.String)
member.summary: A generic async function that Write a List content file
member.remarks: This function will write the result of the object toString method to specified file

example.code: List<double> listOfDouble= List<double>{ 1.2, 1.3, 1.4, 1.5 }; await writeFile("fileName", listOfDouble);
